price: Yɛasεe wͻn a wͻyε den sen wͻn wͻ ahoͻden mu; na tetefoͻ no mfatoho adi wͻn anim kan atwam kͻ.
arabic: فَأَهۡلَكۡنَآ أَشَدَّ مِنۡهُم بَطۡشٗا وَمَضَىٰ مَثَلُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fa-ahlaknā ashadda min'hum baṭshan wamaḍā mathalu al-awalīna
